title: BRIEF-Taiwan's Innolux to acquire equipment from Ulvac, VN Systems
text:
BRIEF-Taiwan's Innolux to acquire equipment from Ulvac, VN Systems Sept 1 
* Says to acquire machinery equipment worth T$1.5 billion ($46.30 million) 
Source text on Eikon: 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 32.4000 Taiwan dollars) (Reporting by Hong Kong and Singapore newsrooms) Trending On Reuters
